response.overview: When space galleon cabin boy Jim Hawkins discovers a map to an intergalactic "loot of a thousand worlds," a cyborg cook named John Silver teaches him to battle supernovas and space storms on their journey to find treasure.
response.tagline: Find your place in the universe.
response.title: Treasure Planet

titles.title: La Planète au trésor : Un nouvel univers
Piratenplaneet: De Schat van Kapitein Flint
